p: The qualitative real-time polymerase chain reaction (qRT-PCR) used the NSP3 gene and the TaqMan probe from a highly conserved region of the rotavirus non-structural protein 3 (NSP3), which was previously used in samples from human origin and with low viral loads according to studies conducted by Zeng et al. [ 40] and Mijatovic et al. [ 41]. In the present study, this assay was adopted as a screening test for the detection of RV in asymptomatic animal populations.
